thread.section_title: VapoShop Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van VapoShop | www.vaposhop.com | 5 van 107
thread.title: paul

author: paul
title: paul
text:
Having done some research I was eventually led to vaposhop via a video of
a review of herb vaporisers on Youtube.
The Storm vaporiser was delivered as advertised, no hassles.
What a beautifully designed and manufactured vaporiser.
Even the packaging is really top notch.
Take my word for it, you'll be ordering the spare batteries and charger!
This takes stonerism to a higher plateau.
